welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Artesia, a charming city known for its diverse culture and friendly community. Get ready to explore its unique blend of history, art, and delicious cuisine. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport houses all commercial flights and amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: Compton Airport's main terminal handles all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Compton Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport offers passenger services, including check-in, baggage claim, and boarding gates.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Torrance Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft, providing a luxurious and efficient experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport serves as the hub for all commercial flights and private charters.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and recreational aviation, providing services for private planes and helicopters.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at John Wayne Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Thomas F. Riley Terminal
terminals.description: The Thomas F. Riley Terminal is dedicated to serving commuter and general aviation flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at LAX, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serves Southwest Airlines and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves international flights, mainly from Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights, mainly from Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights, mainly from American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights, mainly from American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights, mainly from Alaska Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights, mainly from United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights, mainly from United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Monica Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chino Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The south terminal at Chino Airport is dedicated for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport serves as the hub for all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cable Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free by providing their email address.
